visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with the title 'Pie point CSS'. The chart should have a dark background color and custom colors for the data series. The data series should include the names of fruits and their corresponding values. The chart should also have a legend that shows the names of the fruits.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart with a dark background color, as specified in the CSS. The chart title is 'Pie point CSS', styled with a white color and a font size of 18px. The pie chart displays data series representing different fruits and their corresponding values, each with a custom color. The data labels are enabled and formatted to show the fruit name and its percentage, styled with a white color and a font size of 14px. The legend is also enabled, showing the names of the fruits, styled with a white color and a font size of 14px. The chart is designed to be visually appealing and informative, with clear labels and a well-organized legend.
